page.title: 15Village Activities (Page 1)
page.content:
"If you wanted, you could be out every night of the week!" Venue: Village Hall unless specified.{ { {CHILD WELFARE CLINIC.}1/month;2 Health Visitors advise and give routine injections:rent paid by G.C.C. {MOTHERS & TODDLERS:}l/week. About 12 mothers and children meet socially. {PRE-SCHOOL PLAYGROUP:}3/week; 3 paid staff, 24 children, 2y.9m - 4y.6m.
{CUBS:}25.{SCOUTS:}15 . Old school, Church End. During school term time. {BROWNIES:}25.{GUIDES:}19. School Canteen, during term time. {SPORTS CLUB:}Men and boys. Club house and pitch at Puckrup. Cricket team. They organise the Summer Fete on the village green. {
